message.name: ERR_FV_RECORD_CANCELED
message.locale: This milestone has already been cancelled.
This milestone has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_XRV_MILESTONE_ASSOCIATED_WITH_TEMPLATE
message.locale: This milestone is associated with at least one service plan template and cannot be cancelled.
This milestone is associated with at least one service plan template and cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_FV_DURATION_LESS_THAN_ZERO
message.locale: Duration must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_XRV_MILESTONE_PERIOD_OVERLAPS
message.locale: The period of this milestone overlaps with that of an existing active milestone.

message.name: ERR_XRV_MILESTONE_LINK_CANCELED
message.locale: This milestone is associated with at least one type of case and cannot be cancelled.
This milestone is associated with at least one type of case and cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_EARLIEST_START_DAY_FV_NEGATIVE
message.locale: The earliest start day cannot be negative.

message.name: ERR_RV_RECORD_CANCELLED
message.locale: This milestone has been cancelled and cannot be modified.
This milestone has been cancelled and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_MILESTONE_WAIVER_ALLOWED_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: Expected Date Extension Allowed must be checked if Waiver Required has been selected
